channel.title: 金融时报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪金融时报news的种子

item.title: 乔-拜登总统周二在密歇根州的民主党初选中轻松获胜，尽管有选民对他支持以色列加沙战争表示不满而叛逃
item.description:
President Joe Biden comfortably won the Democratic primary in Michigan on Tuesday, despite defections from voters angry at his support for Israel’s war in Gaza https://t.co/8XH3ohj1eo

— Financial Times (@FT) February 28, 2024

item.title: 观点：@kanainagaki 写道：随着日本公司在本土市场以外寻求发展，更多的目标可能是在美国，在那里将与日益激烈的工会发生更多交锋。
item.description:
Opinion: As Japanese companies pursue growth outside their home market, more targets are likely to be in the US where there will be more encounters with increasingly fiery unions, writes @kanainagaki https://t.co/gJ8oUb2Jdo

— Financial Times (@FT) February 28, 2024

item.title: 根据议会委员会公布的数据，去年有超过 14 万家企业的账户被英国最大的银行关闭。
item.description:
More than 140,000 businesses had their accounts closed by the UK’s biggest banks last year, according to data published by a parliamentary committee https://t.co/FXNOQ75Uza

— Financial Times (@FT) February 28, 2024

item.title: 早上好，亚洲。当你们还在睡觉时，我们阅读量最高的新闻是法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙说，"不排除 "向乌克兰派遣西方军队的可能性

item.title: 由保守派亿万富翁查尔斯-科赫（Charles Koch）支持的一个政治支出组织表示，在妮基-黑利周六在南卡罗来纳州初选中落败后，该组织将停止资助她的总统竞选活动。
item.description:
A political spending group backed by conservative billionaire Charles Koch said it would stop funding Nikki Haley’s presidential campaign, after she suffered a defeat in the South Carolina primary on Saturday https://t.co/YKrjoO0rLx

— Financial Times (@FT) February 27, 2024

item.title: 电视明星小厨师米歇尔-鲁（Michel Roux Jr）与《金融时报》共进午餐，畅谈米其林星级、告别 Le Gavroche 以及为三人提供价值 7 万英镑的大餐：
item.description:
‘Day one of my life, I was in the kitchen.'

— Financial Times (@FT) February 27, 2024

item.title: 自去年 10 月哈马斯袭击以色列以来，欧洲天然气批发价格暴跌--这在当时是始料未及的如欲了解这对经济形势的影响，请阅读我的时事通讯
item.description:
Forward European wholesale gas prices have plummeted since the Hamas attacks on Israel last October - that was not expected at the time

For more on what this means for economic scenarios

Read my newsletterhttps://t.co/9W1LiN2e7a pic.twitter.com/RXBxmDevhZ

— Chris Giles (@ChrisGiles_) February 27, 2024
